column4: i had my windows ntfs share mounted in linux.  I accidentally moved my windows home dir to a sub dir, and then I moved it back.  but windows won't recognize my home dir anymore.
in linux the files are all there.  is there a way to check the actual ntfs permissions when it's mounted in linux?
there are some ntfs utilites that you can install I think.
I haven't had windows for years, but there used to be a package for basic filesystem stuff
